# GitHub

## GitHub Username


1. Register for a GitHub account if you don't already have one. [Here are some recommendations](https://happygitwithr.com/github-acct).

2. Let us know of your username on [this survey](https://forms.gle/nZp82At5G4L7QWNF8).

3. Check your email to join the ISI-BUDS organization.

# Git

- Check to see if you have Git installed. If you are on Mac open terminal and on Windows open your command line write `which git`. If you have it installed it would show you the git version.

- If you don't have it installed then [download](https://git-scm.com/downloads) and install. 

# R and RStudio


- [Download the latest version of R](https://mirror.las.iastate.edu/CRAN/).

- [Download the latest version of RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/).
